main event: A series of lights in V formation were reported in the sky over Hampton, Virginia on February 25, 1958.
interesting points: The lights were described as blinking in blocks of three, giving the illusion of six lights alternating,The sighting lasted for approximately two hours and appeared to remain in the same relative position,The observer initially thought the lights were aircraft with landing lights but later determined they were likely not planes due to their behavior,The lights were observed at an estimated altitude of about 20,000 feet or more,Multiple observations were reported by the witness, indicating unusual movements compared to conventional aircraft.
sighted object: series of lights in V formation
